achievements.name: Loremaster of Hoeth
achievements.description: Playing as the High Elves, construct the White Tower of Hoeth.

achievements.name: Tyrant of Tor Anlec
achievements.description: Playing as the Dark Elves, construct the Black Citadel of Anlec in the city of Tor Anlec.

achievements.name: Tyrant of Naggarond

achievements.name: Cave In
achievements.description: Playing as the Lizardmen, construct the Vaults of the Old Ones in the city of Itza.

achievements.name: Origin Unknown
achievements.description: Construct the Sanctum of Quintex in the Ancient City of Quintex.

achievements.name: Stargazer

achievements.name: Camera Obscura

achievements.name: Lothern Sea Helm

achievements.name: Black Ark Corsair
achievements.description: Playing as the Dark Elves, construct a Black Ark and upgrade it to the maximum level.

achievements.name: Dark Mother Superior

achievements.name: See What You Did There…

achievements.description: Construct the Vault of Nagash.

achievements.name: Magma Master
achievements.description: Control the Thrice-Cursed Peak, Vaul's Anvil (Caledor), Titan Peak, and the Star Tower.

achievements.name: Yarrrrr!!!
achievements.description: Control the pirate city of Sartosa.

achievements.name: Yurrrggghhh!!!
achievements.description: Control Pox Marsh, the Awakening, and the Blood Swamps.

achievements.name: The Forest Whispers My Name
achievements.description: Control Oreon's Camp and Gaean Vale.

achievements.name: Forge of the Blind God
achievements.description: Control both Vaul's Anvil (Caledor) and Vaul's Anvil (The Black Coast) in the Eye of the Vortex Campaign.

achievements.name: Best Served Cold
achievements.description: Playing as the Dark Elves, occupy or raze the fortress city of Lothern in the Eye of the Vortex Campaign.

achievements.name: The End of Suffering
achievements.description: Playing as the High Elves, occupy or raze the Dark Elf capital of Naggarond in the Eye of the Vortex Campaign.

achievements.name: Coldblood, Full Stomach
achievements.description: Playing as the Skaven, occupy or raze the temple-city of Hexoatl in the Eye of the Vortex Campaign.

achievements.name: Reduced to Ashes
achievements.description: Raze 1 settlement.

achievements.name: Incendiary Tendencies
achievements.description: Raze 30 Settlements in a single campaign.

achievements.name: Taxman
achievements.description: Have a gross income of 5000 gold per turn.

achievements.description: Have a gross income of 20,000 gold per turn.

achievements.name: Tax Farmer
achievements.description: Have a gross income of 60,000 gold per turn.

achievements.name: Trader

achievements.name: Factor
achievements.description: Have access to 12 different tradable resources through production or trade.
